sentences.sContent: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.sCn: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

sentences.sContent: The whole incident had upset me and my fiancée terribly.
sentences.sCn: 整个事件已使我和我的未婚妻非常烦恼。

sentences.sContent: She warned me not to say anything to upset him.
sentences.sCn: 她警告我不要说任何让他心烦的话。

phrases.pCn: n. 肠胃不适，消化不良

remMethod.val: up (上) +set (放置) →心七上八下的→心烦的， 苦恼的

words.tran: 令人心烦意乱的，令人苦恼的

trans.tranOther: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened
If something upsets you, it makes you feel worried or unhappy
